import AddComment from './AddComment' const Comment = ({singleComment, activeComment, toggleCommentForm}) => { const isActive = singleComment.id === activeComment const activate = () => { toggleCommentForm(singleComment.id) } return (
{singleComment.score}
{singleComment.user.username} {singleComment.createdAt}
Reply

{singleComment.content}

{isActive && }
{singleComment.replies && singleComment.replies.map(singleComment => )}
) } export default Comment;
